appName: F1 Racer : Formula Car Racing Game
displayName: F1 Racer : Formula Car Racing Game
display_name: F1 Racer : Formula Car Racing Game
display_long_description:
Get ready to experience the thrill of real Formula racing in F1 Racer: Formula Car Racing Game, built for the ultimate VR experience. Put on your headset and feel the adrenaline as you take full control of high-speed Formula cars on world-class tracks. Every turn, drift, and overtake brings you closer to becoming the ultimate F1 champion.


**Features:**
- Realistic Formula car physics and controls
- Immersive VR view
- Racing tracks with increasing difficulty
- Dynamic weather and day-night conditions
- Championship and time trial modes
- Smooth performance and optimized VR visuals

Start your engines and feel the rush of F1 racing like never before. Download F1 Racer: Formula Car Racing Game and take your VR racing experience to the next level.
